thread.title: Gulf Coast-shot movie premiering in Biloxi
thread.title_full: Gulf Coast-shot movie premiering in Biloxi - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: Gulf Coast-shot movie premiering in Biloxi
text:
BILOXI, Miss. (AP) - A movie shot in 2013 on the Mississippi Gulf Coast has a weekend premier set in Biloxi.
It's called "Artists Die Best in Black." WLOX-TV reports ( http://bit.ly/1PNjaUn ) that the film was set for a Sunday night premier at the Saenger Theater in Biloxi.
Producer Mark Headley said the movie was shot in Ocean Springs, Biloxi and other coastal locations. He said Mississippi is fertile ground for future film productions.
Information from: WLOX-TV, http://www.wlox.com
